{$headerinclude}
Oh hello! Welcome to the NEW official website for the brony community in Australia! Our website is a vital resource for anypony living in our nation for it has information about local meetups, a discussion forum and more.

Our website caters to each state by providing private sections for local meet-ups aswell as global sections so that the whole community can join in and discuss what we love - ponies!

Now all you have to do is click the big blue shiny Facebook Connect button below and follow the prompts.

All the best,
Bronies Australia Community

The official website for the brony community in Australia.



or

login or register

{$headerinclude} {$header} user['uid'] != 0 then>

Bronies Perth Meetup

Interested in meeting other bronies? We're organising a meetup!



General Information

Location

Kings Park
Synergy Parkland

Date

27 November

Time

10am till late afternoon



Other Details

Please bring drinks and any nibblies you want

Hot BBQ food and limited drinks will be provided



Questions and Contact

You can post in the forums here



Are you attending?

Vote in this poll



Thank you for reading, hope to see you there!

Bronies Perth Community

{$headerinclude}




View forums (opens in new tab/window)

{$headerinclude}
Oh hello there. Welcome to the official website for Bronies in Perth. Chances are that you're a brony here in Western Australia, so we gladly open our doors to you. This website is here as a medium for bronies to discuss and collaborate together using a discussion forum. It's a resource for pony-related media such as art, video and fanfics. It's also the source of information about local meet-ups and new episode news.

Look below for a big blue shiny button to connect with Facebook. It'll save you the trouble of signing up and adding your username and avatar. Or you can register normally.

Thanks again,
Bronies Perth Community

The official website for the brony community in Perth, Western Australia.
